title: (x) "Heavy Industry" fat face - Bodoni Ultra {Hrant, Bob Evans}
content:
Can anyone id this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314221408im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/heavy_industry_3790.jpg)

 [‹ Hand lettered "Biscotti" - What font is similar?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314221408/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33854 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Cacharel logo - similar to Sahara Bodoni {J. Edward Sanchez} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314221408/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33895 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Povl

comments.content:
Looks like Poster Bodoni or Normande with the serifs turned into triangles.

- Lex

Hrant — it’s about time you learned how to link — but [very nice find](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314221408/http:/rover.ebay.com/rover/1/711-1751-2978-71/1?AID=5463217&PID=2330703&mpre=http%3A%2F%2Fcgi.ebay.com%2Fws%2FeBayISAPI.dll%3FViewItem%26item%3D220111350024), nevertheless.

I think bojev and Hrant have the right idea with [Bodoni Ultra](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314221408/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=ultra%20bodoni&sample_text=HEAVY%20INDUSTRY&sample_size=36) which is available in slightly different versions from E+F, URW, Monotype, and Scangraphic.
